extendedInfo.description: Expansion pack for the Inner Garden free app. Requires an up-to-date installation of Inner Garden. Contains a selection of garden architecture elements such as modern villa, swimming pool, log cabin, traditional Scandinavian hut, Roman pergola, trellis elements (plain as well as with climbing roses), old stone bridge, long Japanese-style bridge, small furniture (table, chairs, deck-chairs, parasols), brick and picket fences incl. gates, greenhouse and water well. Your garden is not just about plants but also about you - the gardener! Treat yourself to stylish garden design gems from all over the world. Whether you dream of a setting of luxury or calm serenity, this pack has it for you!

reviews.title: Oshiii
reviews.comment: App would not open,  I play the garden app, which is great but the agriculture one is wack
reviews.author: osha Bou

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: This app is great! But for the price, which is pretty steep to be honest, I would love to have more capabilities. Weather, time of day, some live elements like wild life, moving water,fish, etc. The perspective on several of the buildings is off, but the sheer artistic work and beauty behind them makes it not matter. What would be really awesome is to have elements like rake-able sand. Waterfalls would be amazing, too! The art has great character. Bringing all that to life would be well worth the $6+ for the expansions, and would make this app just astoundingly beautiful and extremely fun. When I\'m done making my garden, that\'s it, im done. Love elements would make me want to stick around and get totally lost in my creation. having said all of this, I really appreciate yalls hard work and it definitely shows!
reviews.author: Adam Edwards

reviews.title: Not loading
reviews.comment: I installed 3 of these and none of them loaded on my nook unistalling
reviews.author: Ellen Merrick

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Out of words!    Thank you for creating this app! I love it so much.
reviews.author: Marcelina Hotovcinova

reviews.title: Nice additions
reviews.comment: A bit pricey though, I did see a comment that it was to compensate for 2 years hard work...
reviews.author: Dave Earl

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: I have just purchased all upgrade packs, amazing content, just think there could be more flowers/plants/shrubs maybe? Plenty of trees and different ground cover, plus all the bridges and walls, etc!!!! All in all, a great add on!
reviews.author: Debbie Toms

reviews.title: First Game Fun, Second Game Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is amazing!  I love it! Although when I first got Inner Garden the game had a frozen glitch which was hard for me to actually figure out the opening screen. But I am sure this version will work.
reviews.author: Angeli Ball

reviews.title: Excellent to a extent
reviews.comment: Love the app, but need way more stuff for the pricing on stuff this will be the only app expansion I buy until I\'m impress fully. All in all 5 stars best app to fix my anger lol no joke great job.
reviews.author: David Felte

reviews.title: Best creative game I\'ve found for android.
reviews.comment: Really creative! Free version is excellent, but this expansion just makes it even better :) Keep up the good work guys :)
reviews.author: Georgia Sestito
